Name: Aliens vs. Ghosts
About the game: Play as an Invader of Earth facing off against hordes of Ghosts in this wave-based First Person Shooter. Choose your upgrades, from Portable Nuke Launchers and Giant Robots to fight by your side to UFOs that fly around blasting through ghosts! EPIC BOSS FIGHTS! SUMMON MINIONS TO FIGHT FOR YOU! PLAY WITH DIFFERENT CLASSES AND UPGRADES! In Early Access I plan to add new upgrade paths/classes, bosses/enemies, maps, game modes, achievements and multiplayer so you can play with others!
Meta Title: Aliens vs. Ghosts: Jul 6, 2022, Sayan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Aliens vs. Ghosts? Check out the release date (Jul 6, 2022), developer insights from Sayan, and a complete game summary.
